description:
These easy-going skis have a shorter, wider shape that's controllable and well-balanced. The composite body is designed for an efficient kick that stays reliable through hardpacked or icy conditions.

  • Twin Skin technology uses 2 offset mohair mix strips for smooth, balanced gliding without grip wax
  • EF (Efficient Forward) design uses composite materials to increase elasticity in the body of the ski for a forgiving kick and an easygoing skiing experience
  • Air channel basalite cores provides torsion-free construction and stable sidewalls
  • Basalt fibres reduce weight and provide excellent flex characteristics in all temperatures
  • Speed Grinding 2.0 provides the base finish for an excellent glide
name: Fischer Twin Skin Power Medium EF IFP Skis - Unisex
